author: Simon Difford
description: Vanilla hints in the whiskey and liqueur combine to dominate this fruity long drink.
name: Jack Punch
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
